document_session_manager_enhanced.docstring: Enhanced Document Session Manager for Squirt 1.2 Manages LibreOffice document sessions with priority, context, and grouping  Enhanced Rules: 1. Close documents before opening new ones (unless specific reason to keep open) 2. Maximum 4 documents open simultaneously during validation/processing 3. Priority-based document retention with smart preemption 4. Smart document grouping for comparative and multi-phase workflows 5. Context-aware auto-closure (time limits for machine-only, no limits for human processes)

scope_based_odt_generator.docstring: Scope-based ODT generator specifically designed for Squirt scope-based contracts. Unlike FixedODTGenerator, this supports proper scope organization without hardcoded category headers.

protocol_enforcement_automation.docstring: Protocol Enforcement Automation System for Squirt Provides real-time compliance checking and automatic protocol enforcement.

document_session_manager.docstring: Document Session Manager for Squirt 1.2 Manages LibreOffice document sessions to prevent system slowdown  Rules: 1. Close documents before opening new ones (unless specific reason to keep open) 2. Maximum 4 documents open simultaneously during validation/processing 3. Priority-based document retention with smart preemption 4. Smart document grouping for comparative and multi-phase workflows 5. Context-aware auto-closure (time limits for machine-only, no limits for human processes)

AutomatedValidator - Template content and compliance checking
